sentences.sentence: Become the professional standard drafter of national aluminum processing machine industry in 1998.
sentences.translation: 1998年6月成为国家铝质加工机械行业的行业标准起草人。

sentences.sentence: The invention relates to production equipment for carbon fiber, in particular to a carbon fiber drafter.
sentences.translation: 本发明涉及一种碳纤维的生产设备，具体是一种碳纤维牵伸机。

sentences.sentence: The drafter of this contract is in no way responsible of the accuracy of any language other than English.
sentences.translation: 此合同的起草人绝不负责除英语之外的任一种语言的准确性。
